Reviews.Title: Reliable, fast, and sleek
Reviews.Author: M. Gail Davis "Surfbaby"
Reviews.Content: I tried 2 14 inch Asus laptops before settling with this one.  I liked them but they both had issues with functions.  This one has had no problems, seems much better in terms of reliability and speed.  It doesn't get hot, is fairly quick on start up, and the touch screen is perfect.  It does have the DVD drive, which I didn't necessarily need, but it does come in handy.  For one hundred dollars more, this laptop has a look and feel of a much more expensive computer.  The keyboard is Apple style.  The only thing I miss is a back lit keyboard.  Other than that, I would say this is just about perfect.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift Thrill of Mommy's Life
Reviews.Author: Lori Holland
Reviews.Content: I've been scoping and pricing laptops for my mom for several months when I found - and bought - this Asus V551LA-DH51T.  This laptop is nearly perfect.  One complaint:  it's not backlit.  That's a minor quibble but I was a little disheartened by it.  That also explains the 4-star rating.  Otherwise, this computer is the perfect gift for those who aren't technically savvy but still pay their bills, send emails and read the New York Times on their computers.  This computer is the perfect gem for basic everyday use.  And the price was unbeatable.  Plus free shipping.  Win, Win, Win!

Reviews.Title: Touch Pad Problems
Reviews.Author: Duke Blue Devil "Beloved of Christ"
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful lap top computer. After only a few days, however, the touch pad stopped working. When I tried to use a mouse, that was also disabled. I was unable to turn the touch pad function back on so I called ASUS Customer Support. They were extremely polite and helpful and guided me through removal of my touch pad driver and installation of a new touch pad driver. My touch pad was operational again for a few more days afterward when it went out again. I plugged in a mouse and it worked for a little while and then it was also disabled again. I also could not get the computer to recognize my printer even after going to the HP web site and installing a new driver. Obviously, my ASUS laptop was defective, and I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Only two small complaints
Reviews.Author: elmcclell
Reviews.Content: I've had my ASUS for two months, and so far I only have two small complaints:1) The wireless card drops the connection VERY often. It's usually only for a few seconds and then it comes back, but it's enough to be annoying. I got a separate USB antenna and that seems to have fixed the problem, but I don't think I ever should have had to do that for a laptop in 2014.2) The power adapter comes out of the socket very easily. This is partly due to the shape and the weight, I think. Even the slightest little jiggle knocks it loose. When the battery gets old and doesn't hold much of a charge, this will become more than annoyance.I've seen some complaints about the touchscreen, but it really just took me a little time to get used to it (how sensitive it is, etc.) and it's been no problem. The touchpad, on the other hand, is kind of irritating - it doesn't differentiate between the different kinds of swipes very well. But, that happens infrequently enough that I don't really consider it to be a complaint.Overall, I'm very happy with the money I spent on this laptop, and would recommend it to others. It should last me for several years.

Reviews.Title: This computer is great!
Reviews.Author: Michael Wright
Reviews.Content: I love this computer. It's super fast and very thin with a sleek and good looking appearance. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Craig Scott
Reviews.Content: Great computer for a great price.  I shopped around several stores for what I wanted / needed.  Finally found a compatible laptop at Best Buy.  Hopped onto Amazon and found the same laptop with 2 more upgrades for $100 less than best buy.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Terry Sweeney
Reviews.Content: We are in our 70s and are still learning.  This I the first touchscreen computer we have used and like it very much.  It does everything our old computer and laptop does and more.

Reviews.Title: SEEMED GREAT, AT FIRST
Reviews.Author: DB1080
Reviews.Content: Nice appearance and seems durable.  Touch screen is responsive and sensitivity is good.  Everything seemed okay except for ability to maintain an internet connection.  On both private and public systems, connection would inexplicably drop and then reconnect.  Updated drivers and had friend who is a PC Tech make numerous changes.  This improved but did not resolve the problem.  Also, the max volume is rather low.  It is okay for general use but if you plan to stream videos you may find it inadequate.  I have been told that there is an issue with Windows 8 and drivers but seems Asus should address this before selling these.  After purchase, I found a number of other Asus owners who indicated the same issue.  Returned it.  Very pleased with Amazon on the return.  Painless.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: chandrica rampersadsingh
Reviews.Content: I bought this machine in Dec'13 and only started using it in January this year.I heard a lot about asus and i decided to switch from dell. I am very disappointed with machine as it is slow,it also freezes up ever so often.This causes a lot of inconvenience for me in my work.The only reason i did not send this machine back is because i live in Trinidad.I will not be purchasing an Asus again also i will not be recommending it to any of my friends as it reminds me of some Compaq machines i used a number of years ago.

Reviews.Title: A very good laptop with a touch screen
Reviews.Author: Stephen E Shpeen
Reviews.Content: A very good laptop, speed, reliability and ease of use, with a touch screen! Lightweight and easy to transport .

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200U 1.6 GHz
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8, 5-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS V551LA-DH51T 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Silver Aluminum)
